alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Franklin; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 9:50AM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 50 to 55 mph expected. Brief gusts up to 60 mph for localized areas cannot be ruled out. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central, northeast, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and isolated power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Period of strongest winds is expected to be between midnight and 9 AM on Saturday. In addition, given that property and vegetation were impacted by a high wind event just 72 hours prior, the threshold for damages may be lower with this event.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Franklin; Western Windsor
